title: # 309 - Robert Kelly, Mike "Cowhead" Calta, Galvin, & ME
description:
Today on the Bertcast, I sit down at the cowhead cruise with Robert Kelly, Mike "Cowhead" Calta, and Galvin. We talk about how Sober October is going, drinking, the cruise, I get into an argument with Bobby, and much more!

This episode is brought to you by Misen. Get a free paring knife when you order a chefs knife at www.misen.co/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
